main.name: Sergio Garcia
main.bio: Seeking for disruptive innovation. I consider myself a passionate and hardworking leader. Always looking for new experiences and improvement. Experience in public speaking, management and productivity.

education.description: Awards - Academic Talent Scholarship, Excellence Scholarship for Masters Degree,Student Development Diploma, Best Grade Award, Campus Ambassador, Presidentof Student Group 18th Hole, Vice President of the International Engineer ProgramStudent Society, Financial and Founder Board Member at Enactus, Member of theRepresentative Soccer Team, Winner Entrepreneurship Challenge
Student and Trip Planner - International Business and Advanced German courses. Planned several road trips for ~ 10 students.
